March 2015  –  July 2015  (5 months) • Responsible for all administrative duties: answering a multi-line phone, managing e-mail, transferring calls, confirming appointments, checking-in respondents and clients, monitoring shipments, bringing respondents to and from focus group rooms, and paying out respondents. 
• Act as an intermediary link between administration, recruiting, and project management departments. 
• Maintain all aspects of a client’s visit: set-up and clean-up of conference, observation, and lounge rooms for market research projects, printing, food service, transportation arrangements, communication between clients and respondents.  
• Oversee and preserve confidential client data. 
• Coordinate use of six conference rooms consecutively for market research projects. 
• Supervise audio/visual recording, equipment, and maintenance.  
• Balance cash and card funding. 
• Maintain Swift database. 
• Cooperate successfully with seasoned market research professionals and a large Client Services team. Summary I am a Geek Marketer. What is a geek marketer? Sometimes called marketing technologists, geek marketers are cross-trained specialists fluent in both Marketing and IT worlds and bridging them. That's what I do. I use technology to market better. Faster. Smarter. 
 
I am a certified B2B Inbound Marketing Professional proficient in blogging, social media, lead conversion, lead nurturing, and closed-loop analysis. Specialties:Inbound marketing, marketing automation, content management, email marketing, social media, web analytics, SEO/SEM, web development, graphic design, presentation design, public speaking Summary I am a Geek Marketer. Summary With a BComm in Marketing and more than eight-year experience in online marketing, I'm a passionate Digital Marketing professional, dedicated to understand each business and provide the best way for advertising and improvement of their interactive marketing.
